original_text: For the iniquity of his covetousness was I wroth, and smote him: I hid me, and was wroth, and he went on frowardly in the way of his heart.
korean_text: 그의 탐심의 죄악으로 말미암아 내가 노하여 그를 쳤으며 또 내 얼굴을 가리고 노하였으나 그가 아직도 패역하여 자기 마음의 길로 걸어가도다

sentences.original_text: For the iniquity of his covetousness was I wroth
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 탐욕의 죄 때문에 내가 분노하였고

sentences.original_text: and he went on frowardly in the way of his heart
